attributes.action: Caroline Nokes (MP) - Please sign the Early Motion Bill 542
attributes.additional_details:
Caroline.

Students. Students are not happy with the proposed Government sale of the Student Loan Book (between 1998-2012) to the Private Sector.

Please support SoActWeek and students everywhere by adding your name to the Early Motion Bill 542 to prevent this nonsensical sale going through; the Bill has already garnered backing from 65 MPs across the country (at time of writing) - be brave and become the 66th signature.

- Ben
#SoActWeek Team
